## Load packages & set directory
```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

setwd("C:/github/WBR-microbiome")
```

## Load data
```{r}
readcount <- read_csv("C:/Users/Katie/Documents/WBR-microbiome/data/Woodchip_DNAquality.csv") %>%
  rename(fn = filename)
```

Subset the data by treatment:
```{r}
readcount_W <- readcount %>% 
  filter(Treatment == "W")

readcount_G <- readcount %>% 
  filter(Treatment == "G")
```

plots: 
```{r}
summary(readcount_W)
summary(readcount_G)

ggplot(readcount, aes(Treatment, count)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

## Mann-Whitney U Tests (because this data doesn't meet assumptions for t-test)
```{r}
## read count
wilcox.test(count ~ Treatment, data = readcount, alternative = "two.sided", paired = FALSE, conf.level = 0.95, exact = FALSE)

## DNA yield (concentration)
wilcox.test(yield ~ Treatment, data = readcount, alternative = "two.sided", paired = FALSE, conf.level = 0.95, exact = FALSE)

## initial woodchip mass
wilcox.test(mass ~ Treatment, data = readcount, alternative = "two.sided", paired = FALSE, conf.level = 0.95, exact = FALSE)
```
